Body:
"""
        Test that a TypeError is raised when an invalid value is used to set
        the credential value of a Credential struct.
        """
kwargs = {'credential_value': 'invalid'}
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'Credential value must be a CredentialValue struct.', objects.
    Credential, **kwargs)
credential = objects.Credential()
args = credential, 'credential_value', 0
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'Credential value must be a CredentialValue struct.', setattr, *args)
